name: Pogostuck: Rage With Your Friends
description: Climb a surreal mountain on a pogo stick and make friends along the way.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP Service Pack 3 or newer Processor: Dual-Core 2.4GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Shader Model 3 support, 512MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 600 MB available space Additional Notes: Monitor resolution of at least 1024x720.
recommended_requirements: Graphics: Dedicated graphics card. Additional Notes: Controller is recommended but not required.
